A

addEnemy(Enemy) - Method in class Room
Adds an enemy to the room's enemy array
addItem(Item) - Method in class Room
Adds an item to the room's item array
addKarma() - Method in class Player
Adds a value of 1 to the player's karma field if karma is less than or equal to 10
addLoot(Item) - Method in class Enemy
Adds an item to the enemy's drop table, all of which are given to the player upon it's death
adrDecay() - Method in class Player
Called whenever the player picks up / drops an item or attacks an enemy, reduces the player's adrenaline level by 1, displaying a message if it happens to be fully depleted
adrenaline - Variable in class Player
 
adrLevel() - Method in class Player
 
adrReset() - Method in class Player
Called whenever a player moves between rooms, fully resets the player's adrenaline level if it is above zero, then displays a message
attack(Command) - Static method in class Game
A method called by the player, attempts to attack a requested enemy in the room using the item they are currently wielding, then causes the attacked enemy to retaliate.
ATTACK - Enum constant in enum class CommandWord
 
attacked(Item, int) - Method in class Enemy
Called by the player, deals damage to the enemy based on the value of the getDamage() method of the item the player is currently holding
attackedBy(Enemy) - Method in class Player
Called by the attack method within the Game class, reduces player health by the amount returned by enemy.getDamage()
